data.oai_dc:dc: Short gravity surface sediment cores from SE Skagerrak shelf, slope and deeps: heavy metals

22 short surface sediment cores (13-93 cm, gravity cores 1m, 80mm iD) from shelf, slope and deeps of mid SE Skagerrak were analysed for water content, Pb210, and partly for Cs137, grain size and heavy metals. The data address sediment accumulation and modification in this hydrodynamically exposed area downslope to the deep depositional sites.

Atomic absorption spectrometry, graphite furnace (GF-AAS), Atomic absorption spectrometry (AAS), Cadmium, Chromium, Copper, DEPTH, sediment/rock, GC, Grain size description, Gravity corer, ICP-AES, Inductively coupled plasma - atomic emission spectroscopy, ICP-OES, Inductively coupled plasma - optical emission spectrometry, Iron, Lead, Manganese, POS55, POS55_S57b, Poseidon, S57.2, Size fraction < 0.0063 mm, Vanadium, Visual description, X-ray fluorescence (XRF), Zinc
